Description.Text: Desert Rose Hotel Apartments is a charming property ideally located in the heart of Bur Dubai, making it the perfect choice both for the leisure and business traveler. Hotel is moments away from the vibrant and cosmopolitan shopping malls with a wide choice of delightfully glamorous restaurants and cafes. Our selection of Rooms, Suites and apartments are luxuriously furnished.
Desert Rose Hotel Apartments is a charming property ideally located in the heart of Bur Dubai on Mankhool Road.

The Studio at Desert Rose Hotel Apartments offers a luxury of space and comfort of a home. All rooms are fully air conditioned, and feature all the modern amenities, including LCD Televisions, WiFi Internet, a wide choice of channels. Kitchen are equipped with washing machine, microwave, fridge freezers, iron, kettle and toaster. The One bedroom Suites offers one of the most spacious Suites with upgraded amenities adding a sense of prestige and luxury to your stay. In addition to the your bedroom you also have a spacious entertainment lounge with comfortable sofas, a dining table and chairs as well as a separate kitchens which offers all the modern facilities. All rooms feature the latest facilities including, Wifi internet access, IDD telephones, multi channel LCD Televisions. Modern interiors are tastefully decorated and constantly upgraded to keep in line with modern trends. The Two bedroom Suites offers two large bedrooms, with King and Twin Rooms, in addition to a large Entertainment Lounge with a separate kitchen that is fitted with all the modern facilities. The Rooms are tastefully decorated with luxurious furnishings and trimmings. All Rooms feature Wifi internet, IDD telephones, multi channel TV, iron & board individual temperature control, fully equipped kitchen with washing machine & smoke detectors. Rooms have unique split level section living room with a modern interior design creating a feeling of open space.
Hotel has a mordern building with a combination of silver & glass facade.
The restaurant of Desert Rose Hotel serves continental, Lebanese and Indian cuisine.
Dessert Rose has a spacious looking lobby and has an aritum look at the reception, with natural day light coming from the glass roof above the buildging.
